findings.rationale: A five-year duration may be inadequate for certain types of sensitive information, potentially leading to exposure after the agreement expires.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting a bond can lead to misuse of legal remedies, exposing parties to potential financial harm.
findings.evidence_quote: The Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment may hinder business flexibility, especially during mergers or acquisitions, potentially impacting business operations.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
